title: US allows non-emergency staff to leave Israel as Trump threatens Iran strikes
summary_full: The US Ambassador to Israel reportedly sent an email to embassy staff on Friday, saying that those wishing to leave "should do so TODAY".
summary_public: The US Ambassador to Israel reportedly sent an email to embassy staff on Friday, saying that those wishing to leave "should do so TODAY".

IL.label: neutral
IL.evidence: US allows non-emergency staff to leave Israel
